1_executive_summary.title: Executive Summary
1_executive_summary.content: Implemented session prologue template generator for Chairman to copy-paste at session start. Creates concise reminder of LEO procedures, sub-agents, DB-first approach, and handoff requirements. Total: 64 lines.

2_completeness_report.title: Completeness Report
2_completeness_report.content:
✅ Created scripts/generate-session-prologue.js (64 lines)
✅ Added npm script 'session:prologue'
✅ Updated CLAUDE.md generator with reference
✅ Generated templates/session-prologue.md successfully
✅ Includes 6 core directives + slash commands
✅ DB-driven protocol version

3_deliverables_manifest.title: Deliverables Manifest
3_deliverables_manifest.content:
1. scripts/generate-session-prologue.js - Template generator
2. package.json - Added session:prologue script
3. scripts/generate-claude-md-from-db.js - Added reference
4. templates/session-prologue.md - Generated output (29 lines)
5. 6 core directives documented
6. 4 slash commands included

4_key_decisions_rationale.title: Key Decisions & Rationale
4_key_decisions_rationale.content:
1. Fetch protocol version from DB - stays current
2. Concise bullets - easy to scan and paste
3. Include 7-element handoff details - key requirement
4. Add quick checks section - actionable commands
5. Reminder footer - reinforce core principles

5_known_issues_risks.title: Known Issues & Risks
5_known_issues_risks.content:
1. Template title is verbose (includes full protocol name)
2. Module type warning (cosmetic)
3. Slash commands may not all exist
4. No validation of generated content

6_resource_utilization.title: Resource Utilization
6_resource_utilization.content:
Time: 8 minutes
Files: 2 created, 2 modified
Lines: 64 (script) + 1 (package.json) + 1 (CLAUDE.md generator) = 66 total
Generated: 29-line template

7_action_items.title: Action Items for Receiver
7_action_items.content:
1. Review slash command availability
2. Consider adding more quick checks
3. Test with actual Claude session
4. Add version tracking for template
5. Create distribution mechanism for Chairman
